org.hova.hover.sdk.user.nfc
Class UserNfcResource

java.lang.Object
  org.hova.hover.sdk.user.nfc.UserNfcResource

public class UserNfcResource
extends java.lang.Object

This class is responsible for using the resource nfc to create, update or fetch nfc cards assigned to the user.

Constructor Summary
UserNfcResource()
           
 
Method Summary
 Response assign(UserNfc usernfc)
          Assign a nfc card to a single user with a based and/or customized parameters.
 Response fetch(java.lang.String userid)
          Fetch all nfc cards assigned to the user, you must use 'UserNfc[]' to cast the resulting data.
 Response find(java.lang.String nfcid)
           
 Response update_assignment(UserNfc usernfc)
          Update data of nfc card already assigned to a single user.

clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

assign

public Response assign(UserNfc usernfc)
                throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                       java.net.MalformedURLException,
                       java.io.IOException
Assign a nfc card to a single user with a based and/or customized parameters.

Parameters:
usernfc - the nfc object representing the data to post.
Returns:
a response instance with the http status code and the body decoded as json and in a class translation
Throws:

java.net.MalformedURLException
java.io.IOException

                           throws java.net.MalformedURLException,

fetch

public Response fetch(java.lang.String userid)
               throws java.net.MalformedURLException,
                      java.io.IOException
Fetch all nfc cards assigned to the user, you must use 'UserNfc[]' to cast the resulting data.

Parameters:
userid - the user id owner of the nfc cards
Returns:
a response instance with the http status code and the body decoded as json and in a class translation
Throws:
java.net.MalformedURLException
java.io.IOException
